name: Jesse: The Ozone Guardian
description:
In the midst of the deep and huge forest, Jesse sets off for his mission to find and annihilate the sulphur crystals which destroys the ozone layer by becoming a guardian.

Jesse is an interactive robot who responds to certain situations and guide you to complete his purpose

Jesse: The Ozone Guardian was selected as the best game in the National Game Development Hackathon among 3500+ odd games that participated
